entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 04:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -26.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -32.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
